ancestry: html > body > div:nth-child(5) > sticky-header:nth-child(21) > header:nth-child(1) > h2:nth-child(3)
html > body > div:nth-child(5) > sticky-header:nth-child(21) > header:nth-child(1) > div:nth-child(4) > div:nth-child(5) > div:nth-child(2) > div:nth-child(2) > h2:nth-child(1)
html > body > main:nth-child(6) > div > div:nth-child(3) > h2:nth-child(1)
html > body > div:nth-child(7) > footer:nth-child(15) > div:nth-child(1) > div:nth-child(2) > div > h2:nth-child(1)
